name: Signals from the Stars
description:
You play a scientist who was brought on board a top secret government project. A tesseract has landed on Earth and you and your coworker must figure out why. Fire different particles at the tesseract and watch how it reacts. What will you learn?

This game is currently in development! So not everything may have an answer at the moment and some things are slightly outdated. It'll all come together in due time. I hope you still enjoy what is here. I'm more than open to critiques and suggestions, have fun!
